title: Phased Release Decision
description: Determine the appropriate action during a phased release.
instructions: You're on Day 3 of a phased release (5% of users). Multiple 1-star reviews mention the app crashes when taking a photo, and your crash reports confirm a 4% crash rate for this version (up from 0.5% in the previous version). What should you do?

options.text: Wait until Day 7 to see if the issue resolves with the full rollout
Pause the phased release, fix the crash, and submit a new version
Release to all users immediately to gather more crash data
Reply to the reviews explaining the crash is expected behavior

explanation: With a crash rate jumping from 0.5% to 4% and multiple users reporting the same issue, you should pause the phased release immediately to prevent more users from being affected. Fix the crash, test thoroughly, and submit a new version. Waiting or releasing to all users would expose more people to the bug. The crash is clearly a regression, not expected behavior.
